verses.verse: And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Noach <S%H5146><s%>, and every living thing <S%H2416><s%>, and all the cattle <S%H929><s%> that was with him in the ark <S%H8392><s%>: and 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> made <S%H5674><s%> a wind <S%H7307><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8686><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and the waters <S%H4325><s%> asswaged <S%H7918><s%> <S%H8799><s%>;

The fountains <S%H4599><s%> also of the deep <S%H8415><s%> and the windows <S%H699><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> were stopped <S%H5534><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and the rain <S%H1653><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> was restrained <S%H3607><s%> <S%H8735><s%>;

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from off the earth <S%H776><s%> continually <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%> <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: and after the end <S%H7097><s%> of the hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were abated <S%H2637><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the ark <S%H8392><s%> rested <S%H5117><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the seventeenth <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7651><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%>, upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Ararat <S%H780><s%>.

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> decreased <S%H2637><s%> <S%H8800><s%> continually <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>: in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month, on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, were the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

And it came to pass at the end <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, that Noach <S%H5146><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the window <S%H2474><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%> which he had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>:

And he sent forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> a raven <S%H6158><s%>, which went forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> and fro <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, until the waters <S%H4325><s%> were dried up <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from off the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Also he sent forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> a dove <S%H3123><s%> from him, to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> if the waters <S%H4325><s%> were abated <S%H7043><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from off the face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%>;

But the dove <S%H3123><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no rest <S%H4494><s%> for the sole <S%H3709><s%> of her foot <S%H7272><s%>, and she returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him into the ark <S%H8392><s%>, for the waters <S%H4325><s%> were on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%>: then he put forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and took her <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and pulled her in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto him into the ark <S%H8392><s%>.

And he stayed <S%H2342><s%> <S%H8799><s%> yet other <S%H312><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; and again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> he sent forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the dove <S%H3123><s%> out of the ark <S%H8392><s%>;

And the dove <S%H3123><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to him in the evening <S%H6256><s%> <S%H6153><s%>; and, lo, in her mouth <S%H6310><s%> was an olive <S%H2132><s%> leaf <S%H5929><s%> pluckt off <S%H2965><s%>: so Noach <S%H5146><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> were abated <S%H7043><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from off the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And he stayed <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8735><s%> yet other <S%H312><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; and sent forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the dove <S%H3123><s%>; which returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> not again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto him any more <S%H5750><s%>.

And it came to pass in the six <S%H8337><s%> hundredth <S%H3967><s%> and first year <S%H8141><s%>, in the first <S%H7223><s%> month, the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, the waters <S%H4325><s%> were dried up <S%H2717><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from off the earth <S%H776><s%>: and Noach <S%H5146><s%> removed <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the covering <S%H4372><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%>, and looked <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and, behold, the face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> was dry <S%H2717><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And in the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the seven <S%H7651><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%>, was the earth <S%H776><s%> dried <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Noach <S%H5146><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,
Go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8798><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%>, thou, and thy wife <S%H802><s%>, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%>, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> ' wives <S%H802><s%> with thee.

Bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8685><s%> with thee every living thing <S%H2416><s%> that is with thee, of all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, both of fowl <S%H5775><s%>, and of cattle <S%H929><s%>, and of every creeping thing <S%H7431><s%> that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>; that they may breed abundantly <S%H8317><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>, and be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.
And Noach <S%H5146><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and his wife <S%H802><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%> ' wives <S%H802><s%> with him:

Havahry beast <S%H2416><s%>, every creeping thing <S%H7431><s%>, and every fowl <S%H5775><s%>, and whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> creepeth <S%H7430><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, after their kinds <S%H4940><s%>, went forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> out of the ark <S%H8392><s%>.

And Noach <S%H5146><s%> builded <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of every clean <S%H2889><s%> beast <S%H929><s%>, and of every clean <S%H2889><s%> fowl <S%H5775><s%>, and offered <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> smelled <S%H7306><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%>; and the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in <S%H413><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%>, I will not again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> curse <S%H7043><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%> any more for man's <S%H120><s%> sake <S%H5668><s%>; for the imagination <S%H3336><s%> of man's <S%H120><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> is evil <S%H7451><s%> from his youth <S%H5271><s%>; neither will I again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8687><s%> any more every thing living <S%H2416><s%>, as I have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

While the earth <S%H776><s%> remaineth <S%H3117><s%>, seedtime <S%H2233><s%> and harvest <S%H7105><s%>, and cold <S%H7120><s%> and heat <S%H2527><s%>, and summer <S%H7019><s%> and winter <S%H2779><s%>, and day <S%H3117><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> shall not cease <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
